claim: Cell- and egg-based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations during production, which may reduce their effectiveness.
explanation: The image displays the header of a Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report (MMWR) with title, volume and issue information (Vol. 71, No. 1) and date (August 26, 2022). This header image does not support the claim because it contains no information about cell- or egg-based flu vaccine production, mutations, or effectiveness. It does not support the claim. Note: Limited to a document header; no substantive content visible to evaluate the claim.
